last_episode_to_air.name: Flanks / Yams
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nicky prepares to meet Daisy IRL. Meanwhile, Meg has rebooted an old version of Kingdom Scrolls that the three of them can play together. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Dead Pixels
overview: Meg, Nicky and Usman's lives all revolve around their obsession for the massively popular fantasy game "Kingdom Scrolls" â€“ a mystical, magical and most importantly virtual world of wizards and wyverns. But when gaming n00b Russell bumbles into their team, the group find themselves increasingly forced to deal with the real world.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The hit comedy returns for a second series, with the arrival of a new instalment of Kingdom Scrolls for our gaming fanatics.

episodes.name: Bears
episodes.overview: Meg meets a new guy called Russell at work and invites him on a date - to play her favourite online game "Kingdom Scrolls".

episodes.name: Tanadaal
episodes.overview: A movie version of "Kingdom Scrolls" has been announced but Meg and Nicky are not happy with the casting.

episodes.name: Betrothal
episodes.overview: Meg and Nicky decide to get married in the game and things quickly get complicated.

episodes.name: Big Nose
episodes.overview: Meg starts live streaming from "Kingdom Scrolls" but flatmate Alison worries she won't make a living from it.

episodes.name: Patricide
episodes.overview: Nicky's dad tries to bond with him by playing "Kingdom Scrolls" but things get complicated when Nicky gets a taste for killing his father.

episodes.name: Hive-Mother
episodes.overview: Meg, Nicky, Usman and Russell are set to complete "Kingdom Scrolls" and decide to make a weekend of it by cosplaying the final level.

episodes.name: Crates
episodes.overview: After 8 months, the new expansion pack for Kingdom Scrolls finally arrives - but the changes don't impress all the gang.

episodes.name: The Chair
episodes.overview: Alison tries to convince Meg to be healthier after she finds evidence of her physical deterioration. Nicky gets his insides ripped out by a winged girl in the game and promptly falls in love.

episodes.name: Mission
episodes.overview: Meg tries to impress a man who comes to service the boiler, while Nicky attempts to get closer to Daisy (Rose Matafeo) in the game.

episodes.name: Raid Boss
episodes.overview: Meg struggles to juggle the demands of the game and her real-life boyfriend. Nicky's being trolled by Daisy's fanatical followers.

episodes.name: Healthy Balance
episodes.overview: Nicky and Meg are forced to spend an evening in the real world when an eagerly awaited update to the game takes more than five hours to download.

episodes.name: Flanks / Yams
episodes.overview: Nicky prepares to meet Daisy IRL. Meanwhile, Meg has rebooted an old version of Kingdom Scrolls that the three of them can play together. What could possibly go wrong?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The hit comedy returns for a second series, with the arrival of a new instalment of Kingdom Scrolls for our gaming fanatics.
